title: 55th GST Council meeting: 7 key takeaways from FM Nirmala Sitharaman's address
selftext:
Key points:
*Increase in GST from 12 to 18 percent for used electric vehicles (EVs)
*Hike in GST from 12 to 18 percent for small petrol     and diesel cars
*Tax relief on health and life insurance premiums    upto 5lakh 
*Increase GST rates on luxury items
*lowered GST rates on essential goods, including bicycles, exercise books, and large packs of packaged drinking water
comments: Gst on air in next meeting
Already ha 18 percent GST on air purifier
clean air is a luxury. it needs to be taxed.
Tax lagane ayi hmari nirmala taai.
Getting Clean air and water is basic nassesity
